Text: Re email addressK good to hear from you I am still battling on the Poly so may see you soon HOpe you have an awesome Xmas and an even better new year Love Lyndon Do You Yahoo Check out Yahoo Shopping and Yahoo Auctions for all of your unique holiday gifts Buy at or bid at

K hows life back in Texas I am not sure if I thanked you for making my first singles cruise a little less like work and alot more enjoyable If not then Thank you This past week was terrible so many drunk and abnoxious people anyway only one more to go and I am out of here Not sure what I will do except I know I am going home to relax back in Aus Do some surfing and refocus on what it is I want in life Hope all is well for you your a sweet and beautiful woman that deserves all the good things that come to you Take Care Love Lyndon Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

REI dont know what the future holds for me yet but I know it can only get better I most probably will be back on the poly in Oct for months maybe I will see you in Jan Take Care Love Lyndon Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

Re HeyLife has been very busy back here on the poly We have just come out of wetdock and the ship is a mess but will be awesome by the time you get here Our first cruise this week is a gay cruise very strange Its not really my type of cruise Seeing guys cuddling each other sleeping on the deck is a bit much for me I dont dislike it its just I dont understand it Women are such beautiful creatures why Anyway yes I will more than likely be here when you get here unless I get sacked or quit but more than likely I will be here Take Care See you soon Love Lyndon Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals
